item.title: Actual Portable Scripting with Nix
item.description: Scripting is among the most common tasks that we have in the world of devops, but have you ever ran into the situation where the moment someone else goes to run one of your scripts, it immediately fails because their environment is slightly different from your own? What about your CI environment, is it different too? Creating consistent environments is a consistent pain point. So what next? Write up a set of instructions for what utilities need to be installed?
